## A New Output Format

```{r}
library(rvest)
library(purrr)

topmovies <- read_html("http://www.imdb.com/chart/top")
links <- topmovies %>%
  html_nodes(".titleColumn") %>%
  html_nodes("a") %>%
  html_attr("href") %>% 
  xml2::url_absolute("http://imdb.com") %>% 
  .[1:5] # for testing

pages <- links %>% map(read_html)

title <- pages %>% 
  map_chr(. %>% 
    html_nodes("h1") %>% 
    html_text()
  )
rating <- pages %>% 
  map_dbl(. %>% 
    html_nodes("strong span") %>% 
    html_text() %>% 
    as.numeric()
  )
```
